name: Chaos Islands
description:
We all love building beautiful cities! But what about turning it all upside down?
In this game you destroy stuff, you burn things, you create chaos as a True Chaos Lord!

Controls:
- WASD / Arrow Keys - Camera movement
- Left Mouse Button - Interact

Game Breaks on Restart Button! Sorry!! :(
If you want to try again you will need to restart the game.
